name: Pog mo fhon in SPACE
description:
Light n dark duality in space You are an aurora trying to get back to earth, lighting up the darkness on the way. WASD - Move Mouse - Camera Esc - Menu Xbox controller also works

https://globalgamejam.org/2022/games/dom-and-sam-gam-4

Sam Nilsson - Programmer, technical support and mentoring

Domhnall Iain Henderson - Conception/Design, "art" and particles

Carl Höjdén - Music

 

Number 1 fan - Jesus "Put a pentagram in it" Lappalainen
